channel.title: Need help
channel.description: hi :) this is my first topic in moparscape forums i need some help i downloaded the soucre and when another one wana join my game they said to me he cant

item.title: Need help
item.dc:creator: @Snaz Snaz
item.description:
@Snaz wrote:

[quote=“iKilem, post:4, topic:333163”][quote author=Snaz link=topic=429581.msg3154032#msg3154032 date=1268845645]
Sorry yeah but have you even ATTEMPTED in the slightest to read guides/tutorials to make a server? have you even looked about setting it up and portforwarding and shizzle like that,
OR
Did you just downlaod the source, click Run and expect your friends to join with some magic dust
LOL epic.
[/quote]
Nice welcome?

Make sure your server is online first of all Also, make sure your friend is connecting to the correct ip and port (you need to port-forward if you haven’t already).

Check the tutorials section for further support about setting up your server.[/quote]

Well you know it does kind of piss people off when noobs post questions before even attempting to look for previous asked questions and tutorials…

moparisthebest.com

moparisthebest.com

programming, irc, cars

Why post that when theres thousands of tutorials over the internet :\

Read full topic

item.title: Need help
item.dc:creator: @iKilem iKilem
item.description:
@iKilem wrote:

[quote=“Snaz, post:2, topic:333163”]Sorry yeah but have you even ATTEMPTED in the slightest to read guides/tutorials to make a server? have you even looked about setting it up and portforwarding and shizzle like that,
OR
Did you just downlaod the source, click Run and expect your friends to join with some magic dust
LOL epic.[/quote]
Nice welcome?

Make sure your server is online first of all Also, make sure your friend is connecting to the correct ip and port (you need to port-forward if you haven’t already).

Check the tutorials section for further support about setting up your server.

Read full topic
